Name: Loop
About the game: Loop is a vibrant Contemplative Puzzle Game; where you and your companion travel through a mysterious, ethereal temple. During this Journey, you will traverse many riddles and face the ultimate enigma: can the endless loop be broken? Loop will help you relax within beautiful and varied environments. The gameplay is centered in playing along with an AI which acts both as a reliable guide through the temple and as a faithful companion to discover the world with. The game narrative will take you through rich environments and unique and creative puzzles. Features Fresh and unique art-style Play along an AI companion who guides you through the temple Relaxing and intelligible puzzles for everyone 40+ contemplative, unique levels Enigmatic narrative within varied Ambients & Rich Environments If you are looking forward to a relaxing experience, where you can observe beautiful scenery, and cooperate while solving puzzles, then Loop awaits you.
